column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////What comes to mind at Lou Malnati's: Ballpark pizza. Cafeteria pizza. Franchise pizza. Frozen pizza. The "Chicago special" was an embarrassing 3 ingredient failure (well 4
column2: with the crust) - It had the consistency of a tire and flavor of reheated special from your local grocery store freezer section. We're stupefied people travel far and wide for this
column4: and send them in the mail. Apparently there is a real war for "best deep dish in Chicago". I'll help you: Malnati's is the loser.
